welcome.title: Welcome to LegacyGuard
welcome.subtitle: Let's get you started with a quick 5-minute setup
welcome.description: We'll ask you a few simple questions to create a personalized plan for protecting your family.

q1.title: Do you know where all your important documents are?
q1.subtitle: Think about things like insurance policies, property deeds, bank statements
q1.option1: Yes, I have them organized and accessible
q1.option2: No, they're scattered in different places
q1.option3: I have some organized, but not everything

q2.title: Who would take care of things if you couldn't?
q2.subtitle: This could be managing finances, making decisions, or caring for dependents
q2.option1: I have someone designated and they know what to do
q2.option2: I have someone in mind, but they don't know the details
q2.option3: I haven't really thought about this yet

q3.title: How clear is your family about your wishes?
q3.subtitle: Do they know what you want to happen with your assets and responsibilities?
q3.option2: Somewhat clear - we've talked about some things
q3.option3: Not clear - we've never really discussed it

q4.title: What's your biggest worry about the future?
q4.subtitle: What keeps you up at night when thinking about your family's security?
q4.option1: Financial security and access to accounts
q4.option4: Family conflicts over decisions or inheritance

analysis.title: Creating Your Personal Plan
analysis.subtitle: We're analyzing your answers to create a customized roadmap

completion.title: Your Plan is Ready!
completion.subtitle: We've created a personalized roadmap based on your answers
completion.tasksGenerated: We've identified {{count}} priority tasks for you
completion.startWithHighest: Start with the highest priority items first

skip.title: Skip Setup?
skip.subtitle: You can always complete this later from your dashboard
skip.description: Skipping setup means you'll start with a general dashboard. You can personalize it anytime.
skip.canCompleteAnytime: You can complete this setup anytime from your dashboard settings.
